document.full_text: on the same day that a jury convicted hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam, federal prosecutors notched another victory when a former account manager at a semiconductor company, manosha karunatilaka, pleaded guilty to charges of insider trading.
document.title: feds get guilty plea in "expert network" insider probe
lines_and_colors: on the same day that a jury convicted hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam, federal prosecutors notched another victory when a former account manager at a semiconductor company, manosha karunatilaka, pleaded guilty to charges of insider trading.
